Howard Gregory Wright (born December 20, 1967) is an American former professional basketball player. Born in San Diego, California, he is a   power forward and played collegiately at Stanford University from 1987 to 1989.
Wright played for the NBA's Dallas Mavericks, Atlanta Hawks, and Orlando Magic. He also played in the Continental Basketball Association for the Tri-City Chinook.
